Name: Coffee
Flavor: The socially acceptable drug of choice.
Effect: Reveal immediately after taking a reward card and replacing it with a mess card. Immediately clean your room.

Name: Compost Bin
Flavor: One man's egg shell is another man's worm food.
Effect: Reveal at the end of the game. For you, negative mess cards are made positive. For example, if you have a -2 mess card, it now counts as +2 for you.

Name: Energy Drink
Flavor: Here for a good time, not a long time.
Effect: Reveal immediately after moving into a room. Immediately take a reward card and replace it with a mess card there.

Name: Enforcer's donut
Effect: Reveal when your are queued to enter a room, and another player is leaving their room. Do not even reveal your queue card. You immediately enter their room successfully.

Name: Juice cleanse
Effect: Reveal at the end of the game. You may discard this card and one of your face-up mess cards as well. Neither will count towards your score.

Name: Junk drawer
Flavor: Sauce packets, dead batteries, and keys to nowhere.
Effect: Reveal immediately upon taking this card. Shuffle all the reward cards in the game box (the cards not in use for this game). Each player draws one and keeps it in their hand.

Name: Molasses
Effect: Reveal after a player successfully queues into your room. They must skip their next turn because they are stuck in molasses goop.

Name: Oatmeal
Flavor: A healthy breakfast that runs right through you.
Effect: Reveal at the end of the game. If you have two bathroom reward cards, this card is worth 5 points. Otherwise, it's worth 0 points.

Name: Recycling Bin
Flavor: What's good for the environment is good for your wallet.
Effect: Reveal on your turn. Select another player. They must show you the mess cards in their hand. Take one of them, and replace it with a mess card from your hand.

Name: Scapegoat
Flavor: It's a little gamey, but it's good for you.
Effect: Reveal after successfully queueing for a room and entering it. If you have any face-up mess cards in front of you, move one of them in front of the player who just left the room.
